body.name: QIBOX Solar Charger Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation - 2020 Release), Video Doorbell 4/3/3 Plus/Battery Doorbell Plus, 2.9W Waterproof Continuously Solar Panel, Adjustable Panel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 41 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 13 hrs 41 mins
FREE pickup Wednesday, February 21. Order within 13 hrs 41 mins
features: Wide Compatibility---Doorbell solar panel charger is compatible with Ring video doorbell including Video Doorbell 3 / Video Doorbell 3 Plus / Video Doorbell 4 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release) / Battery Doorbell Plus. (Doorbell Not Included).

365 Day Power Supply---This solar panel charger with a powerful output (maximum power 2.9W 5V DC) and a maximum efficiency value of 19% providing continuous and stable power for your doorbell. 120°Adjustable mounting mount allow you to adjust the position of the solar panel charger to any angle and maximize the sunlight exposure.

Efficient Solar Panel---3 solar panels to ensure multi-directional and maximum absorption of sunlight, providing a sustainable solar energy for the doorbell. Effective conversion rate of this solar panel charger is 4.3 times higher than average solar panel charger due to built-in high-efficiency mono-crystalline cells.

Disassembly-free Charging - Thrown out the time-consuming and laborious separating charging method! Try this efficient environmental-friendly solar charger! This solar panel charger does not need to be removed frequently for charging, which is more convenient and saves you more time.

Attention---The solar panel charger is an environmental friendly devices. Please note solar panel charger need to be exposed to the direct sunlight each day for more than 4 hours. The charging efficiency depends on the intensity of the sunlight and the rate of power consumption of the doorbell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What I like about it is that you don’t have to be looking at your battery and recharging it being solar it makes it easy. It was very easy to install and it works very well.Good product 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install- keeps ring charged
reviews.reviewText: Happy that this product works exactly as it claims. Keeps the RING doorbell charged. Easy to install & looks nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want to leave a review until I had given some time to evaluate its performance.Outstanding product, changes my Ring to 100% even on overcast days.Relatively simple to install and the unit seems well built but I do not think it would hold up well to abuse or vandalism, unlikely problem where I live.I would recommend it, and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great if unable to wire ring doorbell!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this solar charger for my ring doorbell 2020 release because I'm unable to wire mine in. So I searched Amazon for something to use so that I didn't have to continuously take down my ring doorbell to charge, because let's just say that defeats the purpose of having it, right? So I eventually came across this solar charger for it, and couldn't be happier. I mean this thing works awesome and is so simple to put on, & also has an adjustable solar panel, so that u can move it up or down to set it in the right spot to get enough sun . So if ur looking for a quick, easy, and not so expensive choice to keep ur video doorbell recording at all times then this device is for u, & I promise you won't regret it. Definitely worth every penny, and very happy I went with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We don’t get much sun and being winter it hasn’t really been able to charge since the battery was cold. It helps maintain the battery so you don’t have to charge it as much. If you get a lot of sun it will work just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charging piece Keeps breaking/ read update
reviews.reviewText: There was a few days we didn’t have hardly any sun and the battery kept draining. I took the ring bell off and the little piece that goes into the back of the doorbell to charge it broke off. I called Amazon and they sent me out a replacement. I plugged the back piece in, and it didn’t show it was charging by the solar so I unplugged it and then the piece broke off again. Called Amazon again, they said they couldn’t do a replacement but can do a refund. I’m going to try to order it again and see what happens. I really love the concept of this and when it was working, it was doing a good job. The battery was draining on the faster side because I had the motion sensitivity all the way up. Never knew how busy my street was until I had this. I really want this to work so I can keep my motion detection on all the time because of the neighborhood I live in. Has this happened to anyone else?? Maybe third times a charm?UPDATE: After the piece broke I contacted Amazon and they replaced the unit. It came in the next day and the same piece broke off. Called Amazon again and they refunded me and I decided to buy an another one. Am I a sucker? Maybe but I truly love the concept of solar charger. Got the other one in and so far so good. 🙏🏻🤞🏻There were DAYS we had no sun and I had to bring it in to charge the doorbell but that’s understandable.I love this product and even though I’ve had a few issues, I still recommend it. Also, their customer service is spectacular! They address your concerns and get back to you just about immediately.Will be ordering another one soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked like a charm - Ring doorbell 2nd gen
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this to avoid sneaking wires to power the doorbell.Installation instructions were clear and concise. Worked like a charm!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "From Power Cord Peon to Solar Sovereign: A Tale of Liberation
reviews.reviewText: Before the arrival of the Ring Doorbell Solar Charger, I was a mere mortal, chained to the mundane routine of recharging my Ring every 10 days, as if paying homage to the gods of electricity. Then, as if by magic (or perhaps clever engineering), along came this solar marvel, lifting the burdensome yoke from my shoulders.This isn't just a solar charger; it's a ticket to freedom. It's like having your own personal sun, dedicated solely to keeping your Ring doorbell juiced up and vigilant. The days of plugging and unplugging, of watching battery levels like a hawk, are now just whispers of a bygone era.Quality? Stellar. Performance? Unfaltering. My Ring has been basking in the solar glow for months now, standing guard without a single complaint. It's as if it's found its sun-soaked utopia, and the thought of returning to its dark days of dependency on mere electricity is unthinkable.So, I bestow upon this device a glorious 5-star review, not just for its undeniable utility, but for the sheer joy of never having to charge my Ring manually again. Here's to the Ring Doorbell Solar Charger, the unsung hero of my smart home setup. May its
